item.title: Rap Skills Analysis
item.description:
Rap Skills Analysis: A Computational Approach

Get Rich or Die Pying

1 . Introduction

I am a self-confessed rap fan. I say self-confessed because part of me dreads mentioning this fact to people. I’ve been through enough awkward half-laughs on first dates to understand one thing: as a young person …
item.dc:creator: Edward Antonian
